text: Tumhi kothehi asa, mrtyu konatyahi sthitita tumhala ye'una dharila, maga tumhi majabuta asa killyamadhye asala tarihi. Ani jara yanna ekhadi bhala'i prapta hote, tevha mhanatata, ki hi sarvasrestha allahatarphe ahe, ani jara ekhadi asaphalata padari padate tevha mhanu lagatata, he tumacyamule jhale. Tyanna sanga, he sarva kahi allahatarphe ahe. Yanna jhale tari kaya ki ekhadi gosta nita samajunahi gheta nahi
